message: Let's be reasonable and split it 60-40. It's a good deal for both of us!
I appreciate your offer, but I think a 60-40 split in my favor is fairer, considering the inflation we have to deal with.
Considering the inflation, my new offer is slightly more generous. Take it before the money loses more value!
It seems like we're both being stubborn, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal this time. Let's not let inflation eat away at our gains any further.
Come on, Bob! The inflation is really hurting your share. Don't let it slip away, take this deal!
